Conduct requirement analysis and prepare requirement-specification documentsProduce project feasibility and development timeline and costing reportDefine application problem by conferring with clients; evaluate procedures and processesCoordinate production with programmersHelp programmers during system development, e.g. provide explanation of use cases, flowcharts or even database designProvide training and user manuals to users on the new systemAssist in troubleshoot technical issues and identify modifications needed in existing applications to meet changing user requirementsKeeping up to date with technical and industry developmentsAnalyze and design relational databasePerform R&D of web applications and propose best-fit advanced technologyCapable of develop web applications, Familiar with Codeigniter, Laravel, Zend, symphony, Wordpress.Clear concept about API, Preferred RESTful API developmentSource code version control using GIT, SVN or cloud base version controlling systemAssist in technical documentationTake care of existing technical product
